recipes.name: Scrambled Eggs
instructions: In a bowl, whisk together eggs, milk, salt, and pepper.
Heat butter in a non-stick pan over medium heat.
Pour the egg mixture into the pan and cook, stirring gently, until eggs are just set.

recipes.name: Grilled Chicken Salad
instructions: Season chicken breasts with salt and pepper.
Grill chicken until cooked through, about 6-8 minutes per side. Slice into strips.
In a large bowl, combine mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, and red onion.
Whisk together olive oil and balsamic vinegar. Drizzle over the salad and toss to combine.
Top the salad with grilled chicken strips.

recipes.name: Immunity Booster Soup
instructions: In a large pot, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add minced garlic and chopped onion, saut√© until fragrant.
Add sliced carrots, chopped celery, and spinach leaves to the pot. Cook for a few minutes.
Pour in the vegetable broth and add turmeric, ginger, salt, and pepper. Bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer for about 20 minutes until vegetables are tender.
Serve hot as an immune-boosting soup.
